project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Oil Institution Building Project for Georgia is to enhance the capacity of Georgian personnel to undertake international negotiations in respect of oil pipeline transit.  This will improve Georgia's ability to benefit from oil development in the Caspian Region by attracting private investment in the necessary transport infrastructure.  The project consists of four components: a) a feasibility study; b) a training fund; c) negotiations advisors; and d) project management.
